    • swapFruits

      public void swapFruits(int outerIndex1, int innerIndex1, int outerIndex2, int innerIndex2)
      Swaps positions of two fruits within the 2D array. Refreshes board to display changes.
      Parameters:
      outerIndex1 - Outer index of first fruit
      innerIndex1 - Inner index of first fruit
      outerIndex2 - Outer index of second fruit
      outerIndex2 - Inner index of second fruit
